text: "Slow Hands" is a 2017 song by Niall Horan. It is the second single from his debut studio album Flicker. It went to the top 10 in Australia, Canada, Ireland, New Zealand, Scotland and the United Kingdom. It made number 11 in the United States. ==Track listings== *Digital download #"Slow Hands" – 3:07 *Digital download (Acoustic) #"Slow Hands" – 2:40 *Digital download (Jay Pryor remix) #"Slow Hands" – 2:40 *Digital download (Basic Tape remix) #"Slow Hands" – 3:02 == References == Category:2017 songs Category:Niall Horan songs Category:Folk-pop songs Category:Funk pop songs
title: Slow Hands (Niall Horan song)
